item.title: Knowledge Graph Notes
item.description: How should AI explicitly represent knowledge? My notes from CS520 - Knowledge Graph Seminar Session 1 - What is Knowledge Graph? Speakers: Denny Vrandečić, Jans Aasman, Mikhail Galkin Denny Denny speaks about knowledge graphs (KGs) are used for web search, question answer systems, data integration systems. Specific use case of Wiki Data KG built on 80M nodes, 1B edges Uses RDF open format (w3c) Schema.org annotation SPARQL for querying Following the open format has great advantages.
